lines.text: Once a general, always a general.
Did you get my message?
Yeah, no trouble.
What's he doing in Cambodia?
Casino. I don't know much about him.
[after a pause]
There's someone I want you to meet.
You can't keep stealing from Peter to pay Paul. Sooner or later, Peter gets pissed off.
Excuse me.
Yeah?
I'm looking for a man named Casper.
I don't know everybody who comes in this place. What's your name?
Jimmy.
Can I get you something?
Beer.

[Pushes Jimmy aside and rushes at the bandit, still carrying the little girl]
Let me take care of this piece of shit!

[about his room]
I don't remember requesting a monkey.

[about his military background]
I never want to kill people again.

[Jimmy has noticed Sophie]
The two of us, we don't stand a chance.
No offense, but speak for yourself.

[first time he interacts with Jimmy]
Hey Jimmy-boy! It's good to see you.
That was some place you sent me to yesterday. I got your note.
What note?

[Looks up in astonishment]
The one you left at the Belville.

[Frowns]
I didn't leave you anything.
No?
No.
You was supposed to stay put until you heard from me.
Yeah well, the Feds were all over me. I had to get away.

[Shrugs]
Forget it, it's spilled milk. And you did an excellent job, I'm very proud of you Jimmy.
Thanks.
Tell you the truth, I think in some ways you're better off here. I mean this place is wide open, fortune to be made. You are gonna want to be a part of it.
Yeah well I'm not so sure, not after the last one. I really sold those people a bad deal.
I'll call you if I want to see you.

[Glares at Joseph]
I'm really getting fed up with your negative attitude.
You're not even listening to me!
[repeated line]
The whole thing stinks.
Who could be behind this?
His name's Marvin right?
Yeah.
I know who he is.
You really don't trust anybody do you?
No.
Well that's a shame.
Maybe it is, but there's nothing I can do about it now.
That's rubbish. You can't go through your life like that!
How am I supposed to trust anybody if I can't even trust myself?
I never have much luck with these things.
Neither do I.
Do me a favor and keep your fucking mouth shut!

[Last lines]
You have everything?
Yeah. I have everything.
Marvin's probably dead already. At least the two of us, maybe we can go back to the tree and get the money!

[Glares at Joseph]
You know Kaspar, you sicken me. I'm waiting for Sok, and if you don't like it, you can take a fucking hike!
